sqlMap.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY A.RANK, A.REGIST_DATE DESC) RNUM, A.* FROM T_BANNER A WHERE A.POSITION = #position# AND A.STATUS = 'S' AND A.START_DATE <= TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY.MM.DD HH24:MI:SS') AND A.END_DATE >= TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY.MM.DD HH24:MI:SS') ) WHERE rnum > #POS_STA# AND rnum <= #POS_END#
